...

Persona 4 And Friendship

9/24/2023

Whoa! I didn't realize it's been only a day since I last made a blog entry...I couldn't help, but open this because I had the urge to go on and on to my gf about it. But ( and again, this is me being mean to my noggin) I don't want to annoy her. I used to vent on my priv twitter but then I started tweeting, 'I need to make a neocities so I can just blog insted!' And here we are. Journaling to help with my goofy, mentally ill brain.

I promise I won't come crying here everyday, I just had another 'urethra!' moment while playing a video game.

Despite the blog entry title, I'm not currently replaying Persona 4. I don't think that's something I'd really wanna replay anyways. I like it, I do, but in terms of replays, P1 or P2is is where I'd start.

The reason for this title, dear reader, is because I was playing Project Sekai and this silly thing happens to me sometimes where I see a group of friends that truly (in my optimistic brain) feel like a close friend group. One that can go on for years and years and I just quietly yearn for it. It's why I liked Persona 4 Golden so much.

It was actually my first Persona game. I'd known nothing about it beforehand, but my little sib really really wanted me to play it!

Until next time reader...
